name: Uganda Museum
description: Explore Uganda's rich history and culture with exhibits on archaeology, ethnography, and music.

name: Kasubi Tombs
description: A UNESCO World Heritage site, the burial place of Buganda kings, showcasing traditional architecture.

name: Ndere Cultural Centre
description: Experience traditional Ugandan dance, music, and storytelling in a vibrant setting.

name: Gaddafi National Mosque
description: A stunning mosque offering panoramic views of Kampala from its minaret.

name: Kampala City Market
description: A bustling market with fresh produce, crafts, and local goods, reflecting Kampala's vibrant trade.

name: Lake Victoria Shores
description: Relax by the shores of Lake Victoria, with opportunities for boating and fishing.

name: Namugongo Martyrs Shrine
description: A significant religious site honoring the Uganda Martyrs, with beautiful architecture.

name: Kabaka's Palace
description: The official residence of the Buganda King, offering insights into royal history.
